body_html:
Just like @adampl shared, prebuilt binaries for TF on pypi use CUDA 9.0
the binaries you installed from conda are supported by the anaconda community, we have no documentation on those.

For using TF with cuda 10, you have to build it from sources yourself. Here is the documentation for that:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows

body:
Just like @adampl shared, prebuilt binaries for TF on pypi use CUDA 9.0
the binaries you installed from conda are supported by the anaconda community, we have no documentation on those.

For using TF with cuda 10, you have to build it from sources yourself. Here is the documentation for that:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows
